official_title: A bill to eliminate cost-of-living adjustments under the Civil Service Retirement System and the Federal Employees' Retirement System for former Members of Congress until 1990.

summary.text: Eliminates cost-of-living adjustments under the Civil Service Retirement System and the Federal Employees' Retirement System for former Members of Congress until September 30, 1990.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate cost-of-living adjustments under the Civil Service Retirement System and the Federal Employees' Retirement System for former Members of Congress until 1990.
